articles.title: Demond Wilson, Lamont on ‘Sanford and Son,’ Dies at 79 - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: A guest stint on 'All in the Family' paved the way for his six-season run on the legendary NBC sitcom.
articles.content:
Demond Wilson, who starred alongside Redd Foxx and answered to “Hey, Dummy” for six seasons on the wildly popular 1970s NBC sitcom Sanford and Son, has died. He was 79.
